block.p: As lawmakers plotted strategies to alter or kill House and Senate health care bills, the scores of Congressional aides who actually wrote the bills continued to fine-tune and reinvent their concoctions. Articles, page 7. Hard Choices on Rwanda
Relief organizations must decide whether to encourage Rwandan refugees to stay in the camps or prod them to go home. Page 3. A Lesson in Investing
Millions of Chinese have learned how quickly stock prices can climb and fall, and climb again. Page 33.
